description.zh: 将mBot Ranger改造为属于自己的激光剑，还原光剑电影效果。
description.en: Turn your mBot Ranger into a LED sword.
description.de: Verwandeln Sie Ihren mBot Ranger in ein LED-Schwert.
description.es: Convierte tu mBot Ranger en una espada LED.
description.fr: Transformez votre mbot Ranger en une épée LED.
description.id: Mengubah mBot Ranger Anda menjadi pedang LED.
description.ja-jph: ｍBot RangerをLEDけんにへんけいする
description.pl: Zamień swojego Rangera w miecz z gwiezdnych wojen
description.uk: Перетворіть вашого mBot Ranger на LED меч.
description.zh-hant: 將 mBot Ranger 變身為 LED 光劍
description.nl: Verander je mBot Ranger in een LED-zwaard.
description.it: Trasforma il tuo mBot Ranger in una spada a LED.
description.hr: Pretvorite svoj mBot Ranger u LED mač.
description.ru: Превратите ваш mBot Ranger в светодиодный меч.
description.pt: Transforma o teu mBot Ranger numa Espada LED.
description.tr: mBot Ranger'ınızı bir LED kılıca dönüştürün.
description.tk: Öz mBot Ranger robotyňyzy LED gylyjyna öwüriň.
description.fa: MBot رنجر خود را به یک شمشیر LED تبدیل کنید.
